title: Patch Send-During-Streaming and MessageEditor isStreaming Override
summary: Created patchSendDuringStreaming.ts that patches AgentInterface.sendMessage to remove the isStreaming gate and overrides MessageEditor.isStreaming to always return false. 16 tests in patchSendDuringStreaming.test.ts. Integrated in App.tsx alongside the mobile keyboard patch. Build and all 135 tests pass.
